ing: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is a wonderful blend of ingredients.  Makes a great luncheon salad."
ins: In a large bowl, mix together the cream cheese and maple syrup until blended.  Stir in the pineapple, dates and walnuts.  Fold in the whipped topping.  Chill at least 1 to 2 hours.  This salad can be frozen.
